attributes.action: Lift all UK kiting Bans enforced by local councils
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe we have the right to kite and kite buggy/board on any beach or common ground within the UK. Most  kite fliers carry third party insurance and all fly responsibly at all times. The bans enforced on us are a restriction of our rights as uk citizens.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
